What should you do?

choices.A: Build capability related to length and assign to the appropriate resources.
choices.B: Configure the Data/Hour option on the Capacity unit field on the resource.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Capabilities - A capability is the ability of a resource to perform a given activity that is relevant to production.
Capabilities are assigned to an operations resource. A resource can have more than one capability assigned to it, and a capability can be assigned to more than one resource.
